name: Bowling Pro
description:
This is the best and most realistic 3D bowling game for your device! It not only fully embraces the incredible 3D physics engine and effects, but uses beautiful art work to put a fun twist on a classic game! You can play either against the CPU in three difficulty levels, or you can play a single player mode to see what score you can earn!

Be the world's best player in this 3D bowling game, Bowling Pro. How many consecutive strikes can you score? See if you can get a perfect game (300).

Game Features:
- Stunning 3D graphics
- State-of-the-art 3D physics engine for real pin action
- 25 different bowling balls
- 3 levels of difficulty in VS. mode
- Single Player mode

Simple instructions on how to play:
1. Drag the ball with your mouse to the left or right to position the ball for your throw.
2. Drag the mouse straight or towards the left/right to guide the direction. The harder you drag the mouse the harder the ball goes!
